response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $10,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price that reflects its true value but remains accessible to you. I look forward to hearing your response. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 10000}
